titleStmt.title: Vox secvnda popvli, or, The Commons gratitude to the most honorable Philip, Earl of Pembroke and Mongomery, for the great affection which hee alwaies bore unto them by Tho. Herbert.
titleStmt.author: Herbert, Thomas, 1597-1642?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
